value.title: StarCraft 2: The OFFICIAL LowkoTV Viewer Tournament!
value.excerpt: The fifth edition of the StarCraft 2 viewer tournament just wrapped up!  Rushi's Twitch livestream: http://twitch.tv/rushisc  0:00:00 Viewer Tournament 0:04:33 Match 1 - AgentX vs Rebosul 0:20:36 Match 2 - Urbis vs Lithinos 0:56:05 Match 3 - Quigley vs DorianGray 1:25:27 Match 4 - Balls vs Vileda 1:50:17

value.title: StarCraft 2: TOP-LEVEL SC2 IN 2023 - Dark vs Cure! (Best-of-3)
value.excerpt: Best-of-3 series of top level StarCraft 2 between Cure (Terran) and Dark (Zerg). Cure has been playing very well over the last few months, and in this series he takes on one of the best Zerg players. value.title: StarCraft 2: AMAZING - HeroMarine's MASS BATTLECRUISER Rush!
value.excerpt: Professional match of StarCraft 2 between HeroMarine (Terran) and trigger (Protoss). In this match played during HomeStory Cup 23, HeroMarine decides to Proxy a Starport and make one Battlecruiser a time. In the late game he makes a transition towards mass Tactical Nuke as well. This is ByuN and Dark as Terran, facing off against Lambo and Harstem as Protoss.  OlimoLeague on Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/olimoley  Support my work on Patreon: http://www.patreon.com/lowkotv

value.title: StarCraft 2: Astrea's UNEXPECTED Tempest Switch! (Best-of-3)
value.excerpt: Best-of-3 series of high level StarCraft 2 between DRG (Zerg) and Astrea (Protoss). In this SC2 match it's almost as if DRG decides to focus on making StarCraft: Brood War units only, as he really doesn't play any units that were added with the introduction of Wings of Liberty and StarCraft 2 overall.
